mapper.select:
select count(*) from sys_ucenter_apps
and id = #{id}
and app_name like '%'||#{appName}||'%'
and app_type = #{appType}
and app_key like '%'||#{appKey}||'%'
and app_logo like '%'||#{appLogo}||'%'
and app_desc like '%'||#{appDesc}||'%'
and app_contacts_name like '%'||#{appContactsName}||'%'
and app_contacts_phone like '%'||#{appContactsPhone}||'%'
and create_time >= str_to_date(#{createTimeBegin}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and create_time <= str_to_date(#{createTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and create_user_by = #{createUserBy}
and update_time >= str_to_date(#{updateTimeBegin}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and update_time <= str_to_date(#{updateTimeEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and update_user_by = #{updateUserBy}
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_ucenter_apps
id,
app_name,
app_type,
app_key,
app_logo,
app_desc,
app_contacts_name,
app_contacts_phone,
create_time,
create_user_by,
update_time,
update_user_by,
#{id},
#{appName},
#{appType},
#{appKey},
#{appLogo},
#{appDesc},
#{appContactsName},
#{appContactsPhone},
#{createTime},
#{createUserBy},
#{updateTime},
#{updateUserBy},
mapper.update:
update sys_ucenter_apps
app_name=#{appName},
app_type=#{appType},
app_key=#{appKey},
app_logo=#{appLogo},
app_desc=#{appDesc},
app_contacts_name=#{appContactsName},
app_contacts_phone=#{appContactsPhone},
create_time=#{createTime},
create_user_by=#{createUserBy},
update_time=#{updateTime},
update_user_by=#{updateUserBy},
and id=#{id}
